description: This is a Flutter widget defining a screen that displays a list of available rooms, handles loading states, errors, and navigation to booking, loyalty, referral, chat, and profile screens.

classes.name: RoomsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of available rooms with navigation controls.

classes.name: _RoomsScreenState
classes.description: State class for RoomsScreen managing UI state, rendering list of rooms with error/loading handling and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the RoomsScreen, including the app bar, list of rooms, and bottom navigation bar.
